website_summaries.verdict: The perfect pencil lipstick for easy, beginner-friendly use.
pros: A lovely selection of colors, from dark blues and purples to subtle nude shades and cult favorite reds
Soft matte finish doesn't dry out lips yet has little transfer
Pencil is easy to apply for a precise lip line and has long staying power
Combines a lip liner and lipstick in one
cons: Sharpening the pencil is a delicate process

customer_reviews.title: Lipstick package was marked Dragon Girl; however, it ...
customer_reviews.text: Lipstick package was marked Dragon Girl; however, it didn't look "red." When I applied it was sort of a terra cotta and very light. On further inspection, I discovered it was actually a shade called "Dolce Vita." Since I had used it, I couldn't return. I don't often drop $35 for a lip crayon and was bummed that it was not the shade that I paid for. Won't order again.
customer_reviews.author: ms miniver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Red
customer_reviews.text: I think it might be magical. Doesn't crack, doesn't make my teeth look yellow, doesn't dry out, and doesn't fade.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Meeks

customer_reviews.title: not sure of its authenticity
customer_reviews.text: I have been a customer for nars products for years and I always get dolce vita. This is not the shade they have in sephora this one is more rosey and the authentic nars brand is a natural light tone almost identical as my lip color... will not purchase this from amazon again better off just buying it from sephora , ulta, or a known beauty supplier
customer_reviews.author: TheHolisticWitch

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly non drying
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised that a matte lipstick did not dry out my lips. It felt good on, it goes on smoothly like a regular lipstick. It is very flattering to my very fair/pale skin.
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA WAGONER

customer_reviews.title: But they are all amazing, they are matte so they can be drying ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a red with orange undertones, this is it. If you are looking for a red with pink undertones try dragon girl. But they are all amazing, they are matte so they can be drying but that is to be expected, a little lip balm over these doesn't hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Perks

customer_reviews.title: Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found my mainstay lipstick! The Nars velvet lipstick rolls on smoothly and silkily, yet has the staying power I look for in my makeup products. I tried a few other brands to compare, smashbox failing most because of application mess and streakiness, and this one really performed best. Im glad I don't have to search for lipstick anymore. This is the one :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Van Deutekom

customer_reviews.title: Wedding-Day-Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this on my wedding day and it was GORGEOUS! (I'm 30 and had NEVER worn lipstick before! But, this totally opened up my eyes to the world of lip color!) I love the matte look, Cruella is the PERFECT red, the coverage and tay-put time was good, and I will definitely be buying more when I run out! LOVE THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love w/ reservations.
customer_reviews.text: Quite simply the best rosy pink neutral shade on the market. Very emollient, so does not last, sharpening difficult unless I freeze it 1st. Looking for a lip balm color I can like as much. No luck. Still love this and will still buy.
customer_reviews.author: LTH

customer_reviews.title: A WINNER!!
customer_reviews.text: i ABSOLUTELY LOVE this product. Have been using it for years. Red Square is a beautiful color, and stays on and on and on. Doesn't need a lip gloss; Red Square is a winner by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Reen

customer_reviews.title: Low value for money
customer_reviews.text: Although I really love the color and texture's nice, the red pigment got off about one hour after applying (after eating a non oily meal), leaving my lips cracked with pink-ish undertone. You can probably find similar colors/texture for a lot less. Doesn't have anything special to it
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Needs a sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had a pencil sharpener I used it few times , now it’s sitting without use cause needs to be sharpened
customer_reviews.author: Madlen Dye

customer_reviews.title: rubbed off on everything
customer_reviews.text: Nope not worth $20 it didn't matte and rubbed off on everything. I thought it need to set or dry and it never did. :( It looked so good on a woman who recommended it
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Matte as heck and it stays PUT!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this!!!! It is matte as heck and it stays PUT! I have a little trouble putting it on if the tip is dull (probably like everyone else) so make sure you have a sharpener!
customer_reviews.author: Three Dog Circus

customer_reviews.title: Where's the red?
customer_reviews.text: Not a nice color on me and it's more of an orangey-pink than a red. I couldn't return it so it's sitting in my makeup drawer...fail.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: True red!
customer_reviews.text: This is a true red lip pencil. Nars products far superior cosmetics
customer_reviews.author: M. Carol Clifton DeMott

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite lip pencil. Love the color. I get so many compliments
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Never again.
customer_reviews.text: I paid $38 for a lipstick that's doesn't even last an hour.
customer_reviews.author: bookstore girl

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME, Amazing! Great For Redheads!
customer_reviews.text: I am a fair-skinned redhead, so finding a good red lipstick is hard. I found a blog that recommended the Cruella Velvet Matte Lip Pencil and I am in love!! Very flattering to my skin tone and hair and so easy to use!! I just ordered a second one, as a backup! Thank you for making such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Move on.
customer_reviews.text: Worst lipstick experience ever, it falls apart, I will take cap off and a piece of the lipstick falls out. A shame since the color I purchased is so pretty, but far more than I usually spend, but wanted to give it a try. I will go find a similar color from my trusted brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great texture, smooth and matte without feeling too dry
customer_reviews.text: The application was really nice and the durability good. The color didn't look like I wanted to on me (too orange), but was perfect for my daughter's coloring, a true blue red, not a hint of orange. Perfect if that's the look you're going for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lip pencil!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product that I will purchase again! Lovely color and nice texture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing color! Great product. Love it all around, ordering more shades!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Rector

customer_reviews.title: Toundra Lip Pencil
customer_reviews.text: I have a thing for metallic pink bronzy shades. I think this color is discontinued but I was very happy to find here on amazon. I love the color and last about 2-3 hours on my lips.
customer_reviews.author: ShoegurlNYC

customer_reviews.title: i'm a trend follower
customer_reviews.text: this lip pencil is great for color. i'd add instructions for use, make sure you have super smooth lips prior to applying, exfoliate, moisturize, and make the magic happen to create silky smooth lips for this lip pencil to help make your lips sexier and stylish. i pair this with a skinnier lip pencil for better definition.
customer_reviews.author: shopsalotta

customer_reviews.title: It has the best spreadability whatever it has the quite matt&dry texture
customer_reviews.text: I frequently use this(Walkyrie) for my daily lip make up. It has the best spreadability whatever it has the quite matt&dry texture, though. BUT I have one suspcious about its packaging. When I checked up anyone who have the products, all theirs are wrapped up in paper cases with the logo of NARS. BUT mine is not. How come my product was only in a clear transparent plastic wrap without any paper case? I wonder why and wanna get your reply. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Price is a little high but I do love this color and ease of application. The only thing I would improve is the length of time it lasts and make it as transfer resistant as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Best nude color
customer_reviews.text: My best friend and I are both super white, but I have more yellow undertones and she has more pinks, but we both struggle with finding a good nude color. THIS IS THE ONE! I have bought this pencil 4 times over.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica J Remick

customer_reviews.title: Stays on and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love this shade. Goes great with my pale skin color. This stays on so well even when eating and drinking. Easily one of my favorite lip colors.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Nodell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Another expensive lipstick that is not worth the $. The one positive = goes on easy...other than that color lighter than expected and will not purchase again. Oh -- don't sharpen too long as it breaks!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri CPA

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money /can’t find a sharpener big enough to sharpen the pencil.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color but purchased two sharpeners for large pencils and neither will fit the liner. Now I can’t use it because there’s no sharpener in stores to fit it. I would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Yakalavich

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! I'm 45 and vascilate between feeling like I ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I'm 45 and vascilate between feeling like I want to need make up or go bare face. This is the 'Red' for that. Apply little or more depending on the look and it stays perfectly without feathering. Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: cary scheurer

customer_reviews.title: Lipstick appears to have been used!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my NARS Velvet Matte Lip pencil and it appears to have been used. The box was tattered and there is lipstick on the body of the pencil. I will be returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Renée Cee

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color, definitely buying it again!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent color! Stays on for quite awhile, but if you plan to eat it will likely come off so make sure you can touch it up later. Definitely will be buying it again(:
customer_reviews.author: Faith Burns

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my wife because it looks fantastic and doesn't come off if I want a kiss
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife because it looks fantastic and doesn't come off if I want a kiss ;) Has a fantastic matte finish....
customer_reviews.author: jonathan hamilton

customer_reviews.title: NOT at all 'LONG LASTING"!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It didn't even last through eating a small lunch! What a waste of money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: R.Stanley

customer_reviews.title: True red, classic red, good wear! Recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a true rich red. Going to wear it with MAC Russian Red lipstick. Goes on smooth, good good product, quite happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Atwe7

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as dark as I thought but still gorgeous
customer_reviews.author: Jane Orcutt

customer_reviews.title: ***** SCAM ***** It's a Sample!
customer_reviews.text: "SAMPLE - NOT FOR SALE" on the box... It is only half the size compared to the genuine product...
customer_reviews.author: KIM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect red, light to wear!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike a lot of red lipsticks I don't worry if it's on my teeth all night as I wear it. It feels very light weight and not drying. Color is a perfect red.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Stroop

customer_reviews.title: The color is great. I did have to re-apply but not often
customer_reviews.text: The color is great. I did have to re-apply but not often. Even if I didn't reapply there was still a slight tint.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Nash

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: There was very little lip color available as it would not even push up leading me to believe it had been used. Very disappointed in this
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, a must buy. Really like the richness and the texture . I would highly recommend this product to anyone who loves lip pencils
customer_reviews.author: sonali rastogi

customer_reviews.title: I I really wanted a lipstick that would stay on ...
customer_reviews.text: I I really wanted a lipstick that would stay on my lips at least after one drink ;) It does its job!
customer_reviews.author: Aleks

customer_reviews.title: This lip pencil was the wrong color even though it is labeled correctly
customer_reviews.text: This lip pencil is the wrong color even though it is labeled correctly. I am returning the item
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: GLOW girl!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the SOFT shimmer/glow it adds to a look. I like to use it to mix with other colors. Pretty color of light lilac.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C.

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget to add the sharpener!
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it and just go right ahead and add the sharpener for this to your cart before checking out. You can keep a pretty consistent sharp tip to it
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: I'm annoyed because the tip broke off and fell into the ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm annoyed because the tip broke off and fell into the sink the first time I tried using it. If it keeps doing that, I will have little left to actually use.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Paid $24.95 for an item labeled "tester", also appears to be used. Item was not sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Fliggin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip pencil! Liner and full lip coverage in one.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren K.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came broken, but I didn't want to bother with the return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a Sample!
customer_reviews.text: On the box, it says "Sample - Not for sale" It is tiny and the tip of it is all there is. No pushing up to get more. I paid $23 including shipping for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper
customer_reviews.text: This is the first thing from this brand that I have ever purchased....n I like it...coats well ...stays in place ....last long ...n u don't have to keep reapplying it...I'm happy to have it
customer_reviews.author: Anitra Edwards

customer_reviews.title: favorite summer lip color now
customer_reviews.text: favorite summer lip color now. seems like it would be really dramatic, but pretty on a fair brunette. just enough color
customer_reviews.author: Lagniappe

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice color and easy application. Wish it lasted longer. I layer the NARS Dolce Vita lipstick over it.
customer_reviews.author: gigglybritches

customer_reviews.title: NICCCEEE!
customer_reviews.text: I was given this pencil as a gift. But my car ate it, so I had to repurchase. Really nice product and color.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee Liddell

customer_reviews.title: Same color as the cruella
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it is just like the cruella one... I wanted a different tone....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: color is absolutely wonderful! Such a nice deep red! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: A Song

customer_reviews.title: This Lip Pencil is great
customer_reviews.text: I just love this lip pencil. This color is very flattering as well. I just wished it stayed on longer.
customer_reviews.author: Andy28

customer_reviews.title: Nars matte Lip pencil.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color, gets the job done and glides on softly and smooth. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bri-mel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Too sheer. Hardly any pigment. Wasn't worth the money, unfortunately...
customer_reviews.author: MountainGirl21

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Little problem. I received the box with nothing in it!
customer_reviews.author: KRP

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of money I paid for this item, I am not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: JCar

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The color is so bright,a perfect red just as expected, lasts for hours and blends so well on my skin
customer_reviews.author: Ale Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product all around, but not worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Gooj

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This color is awesome. It gives just that subtle amount of color, without being overpowering at all. Goes on and stays on very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Lip Pencil
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, smooth and stays put. Beautiful color pay off and not sticky. I would recommend you try it. This is not like a lip liner but drier than a lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: AWagoner

customer_reviews.title: dramatic
customer_reviews.text: love the color - love the texture. lasts all day and night without having to touch up (even after drinking wine). Nars is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: nickpar21

customer_reviews.title: Love the Walkyrie color
customer_reviews.text: Love the Walkyrie color! Looks different when it is on but always always complimented and looks good on all my friends also.
customer_reviews.author: jamjam

customer_reviews.title: but a good red. This is not it
customer_reviews.text: Too orange in color; was hoping for a true red, not orange or violet or bluish in tint, but a good red. This is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Benton

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It looks like some kids broke it and they sold this to me.
customer_reviews.author: Sara lyu

customer_reviews.title: True to color but rough application
customer_reviews.text: Nice color. Not a smooth application. Often streaked and blotchy
customer_reviews.author: Julie-Leah J Harding

customer_reviews.title: Had high expectations!
customer_reviews.text: not like the other colors from the same product line. its much drier and the color is much lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Nowshin Nishu

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: great color and it stays on forever! love it! i saw it on my ophthalmologist and fell in love with the color
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Escobar

customer_reviews.title: If you want a great red lipstick,  this is it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Love it! Love it! Smooth long lasting color in perfect red! Just the best. Absolutely Worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A. Strakos

customer_reviews.title: The color is vibrant and amazing! I feel like I have to apply it ...
customer_reviews.text: The color is vibrant and amazing! I feel like I have to apply it pretty frequently, probably like every hour or so, but it goes on great and is very matte. I think this color would look good on pretty much everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie A West

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this lip color after seeing it on my daughter inlaw, great color. I wish it stayed on longer but very happy with it overall
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Barron-Roth

customer_reviews.title: Nars Pop Life is The best Red I have found.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect shade of red- not too loud, but true to the shade. The Nars lip pencils have been my preferred lip color for a couple years. Very long lasting. A little dry, so I usually run a smoothing Chapstick on underneath. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I bought this expecting the color to be something else, especially given the name. I was expecting a beautiful bright red. The red is more of a brick red, matt. Some reviews complain about losing product when sharpening it, but really you don't have to. Just give it one or two twists that all. I was disappointed in the color, but really for $25 it's not worth the cost. It's just okay, nothing great.
customer_reviews.author: Meh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is lighter than expected but I still love the color and formula. Perfect everyday lip color.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Yeates

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible color, goes on cakey. Wanted to return, but had to pay shipping out of pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: i first thought it was a great color for girls
customer_reviews.text: i first thought it was a great color for girls. If feels sweet by looking at it, just looking at it!!! However, the color is not nice on lips. Actually, it makes my lips seem pale, as if I don't feel goods. Next time, I will try something brighter.
customer_reviews.author: evelyn205205

customer_reviews.title: This product is completely clear.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the tender night and am very disappointed by the coverage. It’s completely clear. It will make a nice chap stick as it has nice moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for a Nars Addict!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. It was everything I expected and more. Will buy another one if Mysterious Red is still in stock.
customer_reviews.author: C. Solon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, dark matte color just what I wanted, color goes on dark and stays on dark all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Connie M. Hodgson

customer_reviews.title: Nice texture, not a great color
customer_reviews.text: I loved the texture of this pencil, but they need a more natural color. This was too mauve and too dark
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, color not as red as I would have liked but I love it any way. Lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Connie M. Hodgson

customer_reviews.title: Great brand
customer_reviews.text: It's a great brand, great quality , and beautiful color . Color was as it showed on computer.stays on well
customer_reviews.author: rebecca bladen

customer_reviews.title: Last well, good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend and she loves, can't stop sending me photos of her wearing it. Good price and apparently stays on really well.
customer_reviews.author: Jooby

customer_reviews.title: Walkyrie has been my favorite lip color for years
customer_reviews.text: Walkyrie has been my favorite lip color for years. Somewhat drying but I always lose the pencil before I use it all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous deep color/velvet texture!
customer_reviews.text: The matte finish gives it a slightly deeper look, which is exactly what I was looking for, so I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: WildBirdStudios

customer_reviews.title: NARS Bahama
customer_reviews.text: This lip pencil is so creamy! Goes on beautifully but the best part is that it lasts! Love the neutral color!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Jacobo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the pencil. It's just so big you have to purchase one of the Nars shapeners
customer_reviews.author: Kendriss tremble

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. easy to order, arrived as promised, love the product!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Griffin

customer_reviews.title: This Nars pencil is my favorite lip product I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous product. This color in particular is a very bright and clear Red. This Nars pencil is my favorite lip product I have ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Best Matte Lip Color
customer_reviews.text: Dragon Girl is not too drying, like some matte lip colors can be, and it is a vibrant, bright red on my (medium/yellow undertone) skin. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Bigger than I thought. Cheaper than in stores
customer_reviews.author: Sarah & Travis Brand

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The color is perfect and acts like a stain so it is long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: CTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Best vampy dark wine red color thats how i cam describe it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love that color is a very dark vampy red color is a gorgeous color thats why it was sold out every where they sell nars product
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Rachel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: matte lip-colored pink that looks good on everyone
customer_reviews.text: This is a creamy, matte lip-colored pink that looks good on everyone. Really flattering-brightens the face just a touch and is so easy to apply precisely due to it's crayon shape. If you want to sharpen it, definitely get a Nars sharpener-they cost about 8 bucks and worth it. My only complaint is that I go through them too fast. It will be your go-to lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Sascha

customer_reviews.title: Kitty mom of 7
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lip pencil. It is like using regular lipstick only the application is much more precise because of the precision of the pointed tip. The color is a fabulous "red" with a slight leaning toward a combination of a touch of orange and coral. The matte finish is just right for my face and my coloring, I have a fair colored complexion with ash brown hair and blue eyes. It is a very complimentary color for me.
customer_reviews.author: Len Wecker

product_meta.title: NARS Velvet Matte Lip Pencil, Cruella
product_meta.description: Color:CruellaThe application of a lipstick combined with the convenience of a pencil in a jumbo crayon design. Lips are instantly saturated with rich pigments and a velvety matte finish.
feature_bullets: The long-wear lip color you love to wear
Improves the lips condition with regular use
